description: The spotted bellflower, or Campanula punctata 'Cherry Bells', is an amazing plant. Its combination of deep purple and white petals make for an eye-catching display of foliage. Each bellflower is highlighted with spots of dark pink and yellow, creating an overall beautiful design. Growing up to 40 centimeters, this perennial makes a great addition to any garden. It is also deer resistant and attracts numerous butterflies and other pollinators. With its long season showy appeal, the spotted bellflower is an ideal choice for gardens of any size.
